name: Tania Tirraoro FRSA - Special Needs Jungle
description: National #SEND Advisor @SpcialNdsJungle founder; CoFounder @SEND_CA; #ActuallyAutistic journalist; SEND parent; #Disabled #EhlersDanlos; She/Her
tweet: I stopped claiming once I began earning  mostly over the net limit (while still caring)  As the worry of having to repay was too stressful. But still self-employed, insecure, work. The DWP are carers as cheap labour & takes CA away + penalises if carers earn one penny too much 5/

name: Tania Tirraoro FRSA - Special Needs Jungle
description: National #SEND Advisor @SpcialNdsJungle founder; CoFounder @SEND_CA; #ActuallyAutistic journalist; SEND parent; #Disabled #EhlersDanlos; She/Her
tweet: So many carers, me included, never get an assessment of their own needs. Note, if you care for an adult there‚Äô s no legal onus on you to be a carer-you need to find out about your rights. https://t.co/o4oc6MLI62 explains. 4/

name: Tania Tirraoro FRSA - Special Needs Jungle
description: National #SEND Advisor @SpcialNdsJungle founder; CoFounder @SEND_CA; #ActuallyAutistic journalist; SEND parent; #Disabled #EhlersDanlos; She/Her
tweet: That‚Äôs more than asked of self-employed non-carers and onerous when you have little time. And this was in arrears-I faced having to repay if I‚Äôd earned too much net (it was irregular work + sometimes I had no time for any because of caring so CA only income) Also 3/

name: Tania Tirraoro FRSA - Special Needs Jungle
description: National #SEND Advisor @SpcialNdsJungle founder; CoFounder @SEND_CA; #ActuallyAutistic journalist; SEND parent; #Disabled #EhlersDanlos; She/Her
tweet: Unpaid carers save councils billions. Yet they‚Äôre caught in a poverty trap of few hours available for paid work, and any suitable work must also be low paid to keep tiny CA. As a carer/occasional freelancer I had to send paper accounts each quarter to prove I still qualified  2/

name: Tania Tirraoro FRSA - Special Needs Jungle
description: National #SEND Advisor @SpcialNdsJungle founder; CoFounder @SEND_CA; #ActuallyAutistic journalist; SEND parent; #Disabled #EhlersDanlos; She/Her
tweet: I can‚Äôt understand why the earnings limit for carers who get Carer‚Äôs Allowance is so low. Working a few hours a week for not much more than minimum wage precludes you from qualifying, but still far less than you could earn without caring duties & the rate is a pittance too! 1/
